author: DamiLee
description:
Why do you think plants have such a calming effect on people? 

After the Columbia disaster, astronauts on the ISS found comfort in something unexpected—plants. The simple act of tending to leaves and smelling soil became their emotional anchor in space. This short explores how plants evolved from food to therapy, even among the stars. What do you think about nature as medicine ?

https://youtu.be/kwRSBcrpyj0?si=NXXZ5CrDV1SjfQ6F
title: Do you think nature can replace therapy?
